# HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis.asleepCore

**Case**

The user is in light or intermediate sleep.

## Declaration

```swift
case asleepCore
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to stage N2 of the American Academy of Sleep Medicine’s scoring model. Stage N2 is also referred to as light or intermediate sleep. It accounts for a major part of the time spent asleep. The [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis/asleepCore] value also includes stage N1, which makes up only a small portion of the night.

## Values for Tracking Sleep States

- **HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis.awake**: The user is awake.
- **HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis.asleepDeep**: The user is in deep sleep.
- **HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis.asleepREM**: The user is in REM sleep.
- **HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis.asleepUnspecified**: The user is asleep, but the specific stage isn’t known.
